channel.title: Leadership on PierG | Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on PierG | Personal Site

item.title: Julio Velasco Live on FB
item.description: Julio Velasco is a great Vollebyball coach. He coached the Italian Volley team, one of the best team ever. He’s a leader, a manager, a psicologyst, a guru… and during the COVID-19 pandemia he did a FB live that I want to share with you.

item.title: A Backlog for a Change
item.description: Nice post from Mike Cohn: How Do You Get from Here to Agile? Iterate. | Mike Cohn’s Blog - Succeeding With Agile®. Historically, when an organization needed to change, it undertook a “change program.

item.title: 0 (zero) Inbox
item.description: Is having an empty email Inbox a dream for you? In my opinion it’s not a dream or a goal, it’s a means, a resource. It’s a process of continuous improvement of a better management lifestyle.
